item.title: Logging With Iptables
item.description: Logging # why logging? Logging serves several purposes these are; 1.Troubleshooting: Logs can help you identify problems with network connectivity,app behaviour and or system rules configurations. 2.Perfomance analysis : You get insights into network usage patterns making it easier to identify potential bottlenecks. 3.Security monitoring: By logging specific types of traffic, you can detect and analyze potential security threats. 4.Compliance and auditing: Depending on the company and nature of work,logging network activity might be a compliance requirement.
